text: Sir Paul Rupert Judge (25 April 1949 - 21 May 2017) was an English business and political figure. He served as Chairman of Schroder Income Growth Fund plc. He also worked at Eurasian Natural Resources Corporation, Tempur-Pedic, and The Abraaj Group. Judge was born in London. He studied at Trinity College, Cambridge and at the University of Pennsylvania. From 2002 until his death, he was married to Barbara Thomas. Judge died on 21 May 2017 in London at the age of 68.Sir Paul Judge, entrepreneur and business school founder â€“ obituary ==References== ==Other websites== *www.debretts.com *Sir Paul Judge's contact page on OneLeap Category:1949 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Businesspeople from London Category:Politicians from London
